Getnet

Getnet is a technology company of the Santander group with payment solutions for small and large businesses.

This was a great project, where I was able to participate in several production processes. From the site map and floxogram to development. I worked with the design team to find solutions for the client's requirements. I was responsible for developing the front-end and maintaining content later. I also developed other external contents, such as landing pages.

The Getnet website serves about 500 thousand monthly accesses.

Go to: Getnet
